title: aDittAlum unai
sahitya:
aDittAlum unai viTTaDimai engu shelvEn
aru mAmukhanE mayil vAhananE guHanE muruganE


anupallavi

  eDuttALvai enrunran aDittAmarai malarai
iLamai toTTeLiyEn en uLattil vaittEn aiyA


caraNam    tAyaDittup-piLLai muDamAgumO enpAr
nI aDittAl tAnga enakku valimai Edu
tAi aDittAlum kAlai shuTri shuTri varumE
dayavilaiyO Ezhai shei pizhai porukkAmal
